verbose_text: It is possible that, by decreasing either Salmonella induced apoptosis or reducing recognition by T and B lymphocytes, the tight control of SPI2 expression exerted by a redox active SsrB may increase intracellular survival or limit the specific immune response to SPI2 effectors.
evidence: SPI2 expression exerted by a redox active SsrB may increase intracellular survival or limit the specific immune response
